title: T206, E101 and more for trade
author: vintagetoppsguy

posts.post_title: T206, E101 and more for trade
posts.post_content:
I have the following 4 items for trade only.  

T206 Jordan with Bat Polar Bear G/VGish with some light creasing.
T206 Bliss Piedmont 350 SGC 40 from recent Net54 group break.
E101 Bergen VG+ no creasing, just corner wear.
1905 JT Dye "Greeting from The Giants" postcard with 2 HOFers - Mathewson & McGinnity.  On the top is written, "Cousin Frank, This is what will be your score if you play against the New York Club" (see score at bottom).  Someone decorated the postcard with glitter around the team name and the top banner.  This might be able to be soaked off?  

Here is what I am looking for (please only well centered cards):

1974 Topps Set #1 NM-MT (PSA 8 or Better Quality): 2 (Aaron), 4 (Aaron), 6 (Aaron), 7 (Hunter), 25, 50 (Carew), 56, 60 (Brock), 69, 79, 100 (Stargell), 105 (Fisk), 158, 203, 206, 263, 265, 280 (Yastrzemski), 290, 300 (Rose), 306, 340 (Munson), 350 (Gibson), 358, 397, 400 (Killebrew), 414, 423, 431, 459, 460, 470, 487, 505, 515, 522, 533, 582, 598, 599, 633


1974 Topps Set #2 NM (PSA 7 or Better Quality): 1 (Aaron), 2 (Aaron), 3 (Aaron), 4 (Aaron), 5 (Aaron), 6 (Aaron), 8, 9, 10 (Bench), 15, 18, 20 (Ryan), 26, 35 (Perry), 39, 40 (Palmer), 41, 42, 44, 50 (Carew), 55 (F Robinson), 58, 61 (Aparicio), 64, 76, 89, 90, 94, 95 (Carlton), 105 (Fisk), 106, 114, 135, 158, 173, 174, 180, 189, 201, 202, 206, 207, 211, 212 (Fingers), 232, 243, 251, 258, 264, 265, 277, 281, 305, 329, 332, 352, 416, 417, 450, 461, 463, 467, 468, 473, 475, 476, 488, 496, 501, 503, 506, 510, 526, 527, 541, 543, 555, 557, 572, 576, 620, 658, 659 


1975 Topps Set #1 NM-MT (PSA 8 or Better Quality): Too many to list.  If you have some that meet my requirements, let me know and I can email you my checklist.


1975 Topps Set #2 NM (PSA 7 or Better Quality): Too many to list.  If you have some that meet my requirements, let me know and I can email you my checklist.


1976 Topps Set #2 NM (PSA 7 or Better Quality): Too many to list.  If you have some that meet my requirements, let me know and I can email you my checklist.


1977 Topps Set #1 NM-MT (PSA 8 or Better Quality): 60 (Rice), 221, 387, 425, 480 (Yastrzemski), 491,500 


1977 Topps Set #2 NM (PSA 7 or Better Quality): 1 (Brett/Madlock), 8, 15, 170 (Munson), 228, 234 (Ryan RB), 327, 480 (Yastrzemski), 580 (Brett), 626 

1978 Topps Set #1 NM-MT (PSA 8 or Better Quality): 200 (Jackson)


1979 Topps Set #1 NM-MT (PSA 8 or Better Quality): 102, 334, 344, 610 (Schmidt) 650 (Rose)


1985 Topps Set #1 MINT (PSA 9-10 Quality only with 50/50 centering): 3, 4, 5, 37, 106 (Perez), 176, 180 (Winfield), 354, 376, 405, 474, 475, 493 (Hershiser RC), 546, 561, 562, 567, 581, 598, 671, 715, 780, 783
